meanings.sent1: The shiny, unrusted car caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The old bicycle was still unrusted after years of use.
meanings.sent3: The knight's unrusted armor gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her unrusted optimism was a beacon of hope in difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The unrusted lock on the gate showed it had been recently replaced.

meanings.sent1: He carefully unrusted the metal tools in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: She unrusted the gate hinges to make them swing smoothly again.
meanings.sent3: The blacksmith unrusted the old sword, revealing its former glory.
meanings.sent4: With determination, they unrusted the ship's anchor to set sail once more.
meanings.sent5: Using a special solution, he unrusted the antique key to unlock the treasure chest.
